'''0.0.14a_05''' is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on May 28, 2009, at 17:48 UTC.<ref name="_05">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''(19:40:22) <mezo> mouse movement seems very bugged''" [...] "''(19:48:13) <@notch> mezo: Restart the browser again, you should get _05 now''" [...] "''(19:48:58) <@notch> gah, now the mouse isn't working at all''" [...] "''(19:49:04) <mezo> movement is smooth but the cursor doesnt lock into the app''" (17:48 to 17:49 UTC)</ref>

0.0.14a_05 was reuploaded at 17:52 UTC to try and fix the mouse issue;<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''(19:52:18) <@notch> ok, try now''" [...] "''(19:53:09) <justinforasec> works fine notch''" (17:52 UTC)</ref> this fix did not work for one user.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''(19:57:44) <mezo> mouse doesnt workkk!!!!!!''" [...] "''(19:59:12) <mezo> rebooting and loaded old map, then rebooting and generated new map''", "''(19:59:22) <mezo> mouse jumpy both times''" (17:57 to 17:59 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Attempted to fix mouse movement code; despite working for one user, the problem was made worse for some as now the mouse does not work at all, being unable to lock into the game.<ref name="_05"/>
